Real Estate Sales Executive Job at Kashterk Limited




        
    

        
        Kashterk Limited is a Nigerian-based Real Estate company with a registered office in the nation’s capital, Abuja. We are focused on sales, investment and management while prospecting construction and development in view. We make available lucrative investment opportunities for property seekers and savvy investors. Our heart goes out to our cherished Nigerians in the diaspora who seek opportunities to invest or own a home in Nigeria and are looking for a trusted brand to work with. You can trust us.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Real Estate Sales Executive
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced and motivated Real Estate Sales Executive to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will have 2 - 3 years of proven experience in selling real estate properties.
	Preference will be given to female candidates, though all qualified applicants are encouraged to apply.


Key Responsibilities


	Promote and sell residential and commercial real estate properties.
	Develop and maintain relationships with new and existing clients.
	Conduct property viewings, presentations, and site inspections.
	Generate leads through networking, referrals, and marketing activities.
	Negotiate and close deals with clients.
	Prepare and manage sales documentation and reports.
	Stay updated on real estate market trends, competitors, and property values.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / B.Sc. in Business, Marketing, Estate Management, or related fields.
	2 - 3 years of experience in real estate property sales.
	Strong sales, negotiation, and communication skills.
	Ability to build and maintain long-term client relationships.
	Self-motivated, result-oriented, and target-driven.
	Familiarity with the Abuja property market is an added advantage.
	Proficiency in MS Office and basic digital marketing skills is desirable.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary (N200,000 - N250,000 / Month) plus attractive commission on sales.
	Professional growth opportunities.
	Supportive and dynamic work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief Cover Letter to: recruitmenthub2022@gmail.com using “Application – Real Estate Sales Executive” as the subject of the email.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative (Team Lead)
Job Location:&nbsp;Omole / Ogba Junction, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Field Sales Representative to join our team, who will be responsible for driving sales and expanding our customer base by engaging with potential clients on the field.


Responsibilities


	Present, promote and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customer
	Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
	Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
	Reach out to customer leads through cold calling
	Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
	Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
	Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
	Analyze the territory/ market&rsquo;s potential, track sales and status reports
	Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitiveactivities, and potential for new products and services.
	Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends
	Continuously improve through feedback


Requirements


	HND / BSc Degree or equivalent
	Proven work experience as a Sales Representative
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office
	Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
	Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
	Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
	Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs
	Relationship management skills and openness to feedback


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;

Sales Representative (Team Lead) Job at Fibrehub Internetworking Services Limited




        
    

        
        Fibrehub Internetworking Services Limited is a telecommunication and Information Technology service company. We offer a combination of business solutions designed to enhance the efficiency and productivity of our clients. Over the years we have been able to identify and develop competence for analyzing and understanding business operations, the cost drivers, and operational hiccups that create inefficiencies and challenges in organizations. We have numerous customized business solutions designed to address our client's specific telecommunication challenges; giving the organization the required edge in today’s highly competitive market.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative (Team Lead)
Job Location: Omole / Ogba Junction, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Field Sales Representative to join our team, who will be responsible for driving sales and expanding our customer base by engaging with potential clients on the field.


Responsibilities


	Present, promote and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customer
	Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
	Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
	Reach out to customer leads through cold calling
	Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
	Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
	Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
	Analyze the territory/ market’s potential, track sales and status reports
	Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitiveactivities, and potential for new products and services.
	Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends
	Continuously improve through feedback


Requirements


	HND / BSc Degree or equivalent
	Proven work experience as a Sales Representative
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office
	Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
	Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
	Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
	Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs
	Relationship management skills and openness to feedback


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and application to: hr@fibrehub.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
